name: bitfield
description:
bitfield is a fast-paced, challenging minimalist space shooter inspired by the games of my childhood, filtered through a generous helping of glitches, CRT effects, and hazy memories. Fight your way through six thrilling levels, defeat dangerous bosses, collect useful powerups, and save the world!

  • Thrilling pixel action
  • Six increasingly difficult levels (three in the free demo)
  • Ten tracks of original, retro-inspired music (soundtrack coming soon!)

System requirements:

  • a Windows computer (any reasonably modern PC should work)
  • a keyboard (gamepads not yet supported, sorry!)
  • a monitor capable of at least 1024x768 resolution
